name: Dragon Ball Z: Budokai
description:
Dragon Ball Z: Budokai (武道会) is a series of fighting video games based on the anime series Dragon Ball Z.

Dragon Ball Z Budokai was released on December 4, 2002. It was developed by Dimps and published by Infogrames for PS2 and GCN.
Cartoon Network's popular Anime series comes to life on the PlayStation 2! Fight to the finish against the deadliest fighters in the universe and take on the most powerful heroes and the most evil villains in Dragon Ball Z. The more you win, the more difficult it gets. Can you survive?
